skills.name: BLOOD LUST
desc: • Deals 2 hits of random damage to a single target.
• Heals self and gains Armor and Magic Penetration if below 50% HP.

skills.name: SHAMBLES
desc: • Gain Critical Strike status for 2 turns.
• 50% Chance to gain an Extra Turn.

skills.name: CHEAP SHOT
desc: Remove all Beneficial Effects, including Golden Effects, from a random target and Blinds them for 1 turn at the start of every turn.
